name: Player Flip - Jumping Battle
description:
This is a simple but interesting game where you have to jump left or right to get rid off the enemies. Don't hurry and plan your move in advance to avoid the deadly traps an the way.

GAME FEATURES:

- Simple and cool one-touch gameplay controls
- Trending voxel graphics
- 8 cute characters with different skill sets to use
- Complete quests to upgrade skills
- Collect coins to unlock cool characters, .


This game has everything to keep your entertained for hours. Download it today for free and challenge your friends with the best highscore. Enjoy!
